sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Provide fast, relevant search via schema design, ranking, and incremental indexing with robust monitoring.

sections.title: Schema & Fields
sections.content: Entity schemas; analyzers; synonyms; facets/filters; multi-language support and stemming rules.

sections.title: Ranking & Relevance
sections.content: Signals (text, popularity, recency); boosting; query understanding; evaluation with offline/online metrics.

sections.title: Indexing & Consistency
sections.content: Incremental updates; backfills; idempotent pipelines; consistency models and SLAs for freshness.

sections.title: Monitoring & Ops
sections.content: Query latency/error budgets; zero-results tracking; degradation alerts; safe reindex strategies.
